verbose_text: These findings support several studies that found that the addition of an iron chelator to a PpIX precursor increased PpIX accumulation and therefore fluorescence before irradiation 26, 55, 56, with MAL + CP94 treated cells producing the greatest enhancement of PpIX fluorescence in tumor cells 12, 20.
evidence: iron chelator to a PpIX precursor increased PpIX
